desc.data: ¶• neutral (vertical), used as opening or closing quotation mark¶• preferred characters in English for paired quotation marks are 201C & 201D¶→ (modifier letter double prime - 02BA)¶→ (combining double acute accent - 030B)¶→ (combining double vertical line above - 030E)¶→ (double prime - 2033)¶→ (ditto mark - 3003)
